features: ✅【𝐅𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐈𝐍𝐈𝐔 — 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐒𝐀𝐅𝐄 𝐅𝐚𝐬𝐭 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐞 𝐏𝐫𝐨】 Experience the safest charging with over 38 million global users. At INIU, we use only the highest-grade materials, so we do have the confidence to provide an industry-leading 3 years warranty.

✅【𝟐𝟐.𝟓𝐖 𝐒𝐩𝐞𝐞𝐝𝐲 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐞】INIU 22.5W power bank combines the most advanced PD 3.0 & QC 4+ fast charging technologies—incredibly fast fuel your new iPhone from 0 to 60% in 30mins, nearly 2X faster than original 2.4A chargers.
✅【𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐜𝐭 𝐚𝐬 𝐀 𝐂𝐚𝐫𝐝】This incredibly compact body is 17% thinner, 23% smaller, and 38% lighter than its kind. You can easily toss it into any pocket without feeling bulky.

✅【𝟐𝟎𝟐4 𝐕𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐈𝐧𝐩𝐮𝐭 & 𝐎𝐮𝐭𝐩𝐮𝐭 𝐔𝐒𝐁 𝐂】Unlike most chargers featuring a USB C input only, INIU 10000 mAh portable charger has a USB-C In & Out port to perfectly fit your new iPhones, iPad and all upcoming USB-C devices.
✅【𝐏𝐨𝐰𝐞𝐫 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐃𝐚𝐲𝐬】The capacity of 10000mAh is stored in the mini body, providing juice to charge iPhone 8 3.6 times, Samsung S10 2.1 times, iPad Mini 1.5 times, and AirPods pro 12.5 times, etc.
✅【𝐅𝐚𝐬𝐭 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐞 𝟑 𝐃𝐞𝐯𝐢𝐜𝐞𝐬 𝐚𝐭 𝐎𝐧𝐜𝐞】INIU PD10000 can fast fuel 3 devices at the same time. Entertainment with friends will continue despite battery emergencies. Save more time for enjoying yourself.
✅【𝐕𝐚𝐬𝐭 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲】INIU PD10000 fits every device from big as iPad and small as Airpods. Conveniently, it can activate a special charge mode for your diverse devices.
✅【What You Get】10000mAh power bank*1, USB C cable*1, user manual*1, travel pouch*1, 𝟑𝟎-𝐝𝐚𝐲 𝐦𝐨𝐧𝐞𝐲 𝐛𝐚𝐜𝐤 𝐠𝐮𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐞, industry-leading 𝟑-𝐲𝐞𝐚𝐫 𝐰𝐚𝐫𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐭𝐲, plus 𝐥𝐢𝐟𝐞𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐞 𝐭𝐞𝐜𝐡𝐧𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐥 𝐬𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small affordable fast charger😍
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a small power bank and i was glad that my eyes got on this one.. i purchased it and I must say, it’s a game changer for my daily tech needs. The first thing that struck me was its sleek design. The size is just right, fitting comfortably in my pocket or bag..Even its small size, the number of USB inputs and outputs is perfect, It allows me to charge multiple devices simultaneously, which is a huge convenience. The charging speed is impressive too, it took me only half an hour to refuel it , providing quick power-ups when I’m on the go.. I’ve used it extensively since purchasing and it’s held up wonderfully..It has also a phone holder on the side , a mini port that you can pull it to allow u to put your phone and enjoy your show or videos.Overall, I couldn’t be happier with this purchase. It strikes the right balance between size, functionality, and style, not forgetting its affordable price. If you’re in the market for a small but powerful power bank, this is the one to get .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact Powerhouse – The Perfect Balance of Size and Functionality
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this power bank and I must say, it’s a game changer for my daily tech needs. The first thing that struck me was its sleek design – it’s not just functional, it’s also aesthetically pleasing. The size is just right, fitting comfortably in my pocket or bag without adding any bulk.What really sets this power bank apart is the perfect number of USB inputs and outputs. It allows me to charge multiple devices simultaneously, which is a huge convenience. The charging speed is impressive too, providing quick power-ups when I’m on the go.The build quality is top-notch, giving it a sturdy and durable feel. I’ve used it extensively since purchasing and it’s held up wonderfully. It’s been a reliable companion on long trips, keeping my devices powered throughout.Overall, I couldn’t be happier with this purchase. It strikes the right balance between size, functionality, and style. If you’re in the market for a small but powerful power bank, this is the one to get!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little thick, a little heavy, but delivers on performance and charges superfast
reviews.reviewText: At 9oz it's heavier than most phones and nearly an inch thick it feels bulky, but this is offset by the smooth, rounded edges and corners, so it feels comfortable in the hand. Build quality is very good, almost on par with Anker batteries, my biggest concern is the hard/clear plastic display; it flexes just a hair on the long display side and I don't know if it'll survive a hard smack or drop. (i've dropped my anker battery packs without any issues).My biggest love is the speed it'll recharge my GS21 and my son's iphone 13 (at the same time) and how quickly it'll recharge when plugged in. and i do like the display; helps dissipate 'battery anxiety'.The 'kickstand' is kinda nifty, but i fully expect that to break/fail...but it does work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars small pocket size and easy to read display
reviews.reviewText: Pros: Its a good powerful charger. Powers heated jacket/vest for up to 2 hours on mid heat setting, charges cell phones and other devices pretty quickly, great pocket size and bright easy to read display. Cons: it takes a long time to fully charge and doesn't shut off, and continues to discharge while not in use as other users have noted as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great travel battery as well as everyday use
reviews.reviewText: I love the size and power of this little power bank. It fits neatly into my handbag or my laptop bag. It charges back up quickly and is fairly light weight. Because I have an iPad Pro and Mini and iPhone, it does drain this little guy fairly quick, but with the 10k mAh, it can give you a few charges before you have to charge it back up. Good product and the price was great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Peace of mind
reviews.reviewText: It’s small, powerful, charges fast & great for traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Quest 3
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to use to extend the battery life of my Meta Quest 3. I attached it to the back of the stock strap, it's the perfect size and weight. It works great to keep the battery level. It doesn't charge while in use, at least when using USB-C to USB-C. It adds about 3 hours, but I didn't time it exactly. I used this combined with the cable "SUNGUY USB C to USB C Cable 1FT" and had no problems if anyone else is looking to use this with a Quest 3.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Charger
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my wife to charge her equipment on trips and such. She loves it. It's very portable easy to carry and charges her stuff quickly. She loved it so much she had me buy another one for her to keep at work. With the easy display showing exactly how much battery life is left there is no second guessing on when it's time to recharge. She even charges two devices at the same time. It does state three at once but, she has only tried two and it worked great.It's lightweight and can fit in most pockets in your pants, coats, or bags. In today's world of gadgets and gizmo's it's almost crucial to have a backup charger.

Petite batterie transportable arrondie , livrée avec un petit cable USB-USB C, avec un peu de poids , ce qui indique qu' il y a de la batterie donc de la qualité , elle est très simple d' utilisation et surtout très pratique, non seulement à transporter avec sa taille et ses arrondies mais aussi à l' utilisation avec ses 3 sorties USB dont une USB C et cette même sortie USB C qui fait entrée . Moyennant bien cliquer pour faire entrer le cable ( pas comme moi qui pensait que ça ne marchait pas alors que j' avais mal enfoncé le cable dans les entrés ) , il alimentera bien les smartphones à la batterie déchargée ou fatiguée comme le mien . Avec une charge à 100% cette batterie de secours est capable de recharger 4 fois MON téléphone ( 1 fois suffit généralement dans la journée ) , ce qui laisse le temps en étant pas obligé de la recharger tout de suite . Très content de cette batterie d' appoint capable de recharger plusieurs fois un smartphone, simple d' utilisation avec son afficheur de charge, sa forme arrondie pour le transport dans la poche et ses 3 connecteurs ,si dans la durée ça tient un minimum c'est un très bon produit , à recommander .

reviews.reviewTitle: Small but feature packed at a very competitive price!
reviews.reviewText: I've had this little power bank for over a week now and it sure is impressive.In the package you get the power bank, some instructions and warranty, a usb-a to usb-c cable and a carrying case.Design and esthetics:The design of the INIU power bank is well thought out. The rounded corners makes it more comfortable to hold and the textured surface material adds more grip in your hands. The power capacity indicator is also very neat with leds that indicates the battery percentage and the charging status. The size of the power bank is also quite small which make it more portable. As a bonus, the power bank even has a retractable stand to put you phone on.Performance:Despite it's small size, the INIU power bank features a nice 10000mah battery capacity which is enough to charge my Galaxy S10+ 3 times. An excellent feature is the 22.5W fast charging that works with both android and IPhone. This feature makes the usage of the power bank much more convenient. Speaking of convenience, the INIU power bank has 3 ports, 2 usb-a for output and one usb-c for output and input. Using my 18w samsung charger, I am able to fill up in about an hour and a half. Value: the price of the INIU power bank makes it a real bargain, it's well built and supports fast charging. For it's price, the device feels and looks very premium and sports useful features like fast charging and a integrated phone stand.Overall, I give the INIU power bank a solid recommendation.

También es importante y se agradece la posibilidad de carga rápida que en este producto funciona de verdad, como podéis observar en la foto y en el vídeo. Cuando se está cargando o descargando en carga rápida aparece a la derecha de los dígitos el símbolo del rayo. Powerbank jest tak mały, że można go wszędzie zabrać ze sobą. Bardzo dobra jakość wykonania. No i oczywiście szybkie ładowanie. Dodatkowo fajna opcja to wysuwana podpórka do telefonu. Można sobie postawić telefon podczas ładowania i oglądać film. Polecam.
